channel.title: Missing an undo feature
channel.description: A lot of the time, I make tracks with no mistakes. But when I accidentally delete a loop... there's a problem. In my opinion, we all learn from our mistakes, and we should always get a chance to fix them. So, maybe on the next update, there should be an undo action. Like shaking your device gives a menu where you have three options: Undo, Redo, and of course, Cancel (or literally just tap outside the box)

item.title: Missing an undo feature
item.dc:creator: Lucas
item.description:
I agree that’s a good precaution, but when people are skimming down on unneeded instruments, loops, etc., they usually just tap past it before realizing their mistake.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing an undo feature
item.dc:creator: RazerFireRiot
item.description:
Agreed. The app is so simple to use, that when you make a song on it, it sounds like you used a more professional music studio.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing an undo feature
item.dc:creator: Slackmaster
item.description:
Aye aye! undo / redo would be a very nice feature , and shaking is the standard iPod gesture to trigger the undo dialog box, so yeah, it would be nice, provided it doesn’t create issues with RAM that could cause Auxy to rollback other features or crash more often. More often? Wait a second I lost my mind there for a second. Let m clarify that comment, Auxy is the most stable app I’ve ever used, and I’m dead serious. The developers are phenomenal.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing an undo feature

item.description:
This is a great idea! We seriously need this.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing an undo feature

item.description:
I can remember that one time that I had accidentally deleted my melody lead, after I (thank goodness) rendered it, so I had to do it by scratch. it turned out amazing after that

item.title: Missing an undo feature
item.dc:creator: RazerFireRiot
item.description:
As it turns out, I was working on a project and I was deleting unnecessary loops
Until I accidentally deleted the most important one in the project.
This happened to me a few times, and it’s pretty crucial to have an Undo action

Read full topic
